title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When searching for references to a certain field in external jar using build 200201151, the search results are not being selected. This issue can be reproduced by performing a search for references to the field in question.
OB: The search results should be displayed and the appropriate references to the field should be automatically selected.
EB: After performing the search, there should be 3 matches found in the method getTempDir(). However, none of these matches are being selected.
SR: Fix the issue causing the search results to not be selected properly in the external jar. Ensure that the search results are displayed and the appropriate references to the field are automatically selected.
